entities.name: the man with two faces
entities.description: The ticket barrier guard is described as 'wizened old' and has a unique appearance.

entities.name: ron
entities.description: Ron invites Harry to stay with him during the summer.

entities.name: harry potter
entities.description: Harry is mentioned as being famous and is greeted by people at the gate.

entities.name: hermione
entities.description: Hermione passes through the gateway with Harry and Ron.

entities.name: ginny weasley
entities.description: Ginny is excited to see Harry and points him out to her mother.

entities.name: mrs. weasley
entities.description: Mrs. Weasley greets Harry and Ron with a smile.

entities.name: the muggles
entities.description: The Muggles are mentioned as being alarmed by the sudden exit of wizards.

relationships.description: Ron invites Harry to stay with him during the summer.
